    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question(Course course,
        java.lang.String question,
        java.lang.String[] answers,
        int correct)
        Constructs a question.
        Parameters:
        course - A course that will be linked to the question.
        question - The question string.
        answers - The different answers.
        correct - The correct answer by index.

      • Question

        public Question(Course course,
        java.lang.String question,
        java.lang.String[] answers)
        Construct a question. Randomizes the correct answer from the given String array answers.
        Parameters:
        course - A course that will be linked to the question.
        question - The question string.
        answers - The different answers.

    • Method Detail

      • getCourse

        public Course getCourse()
        Gets the course from the question.
        Returns:
        The question's corresponding course.

      • printString

        public void printString(boolean gotBook)
        Prints the question in standard out. If gotBook is true one false answer is not printed.
        Parameters:
        gotBook - A boolean.

      • checkAnswer

        public boolean checkAnswer(java.lang.String i)
        Checks if the parameter i is a correct answer's index.
        Parameters:
        i - The index to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if i is a correct answer's index.
